scripts.initialize: docker exec -i sql-clustering psql -U dev_user -d sql_clustering < init.sql
scripts.seed: docker exec -i sql-clustering psql -U dev_user -d sql_clustering < seed.sql
scripts.drop: docker exec -i sql-clustering psql -U dev_user -d sql_clustering < drop.sql
scripts.transform: docker exec -i sql-clustering psql -U dev_user -d sql_clustering < transform.sql
scripts.reset: yarn drop && yarn initialize && yarn seed
